name: CLP – Custom Login Page by NiteoThemes
author: NiteoThemes

sections.description:
Custom Login Page plugin allows you to customize any essential element on WordPress login page. It utilizes powerful customizer to implement changes in real-time. Change of a logo, graphic background, typography or just a simple tweak cannot get easier than this.

Features

  • Carefully crafted predefined templates to choose from: minimalist, flat, light, dark and more.
  • Customizable layout – from full width, 50-50 to 2/3 layout.
  • Logo customization: disable logo, custom text with chosen typography or a graphic logo.
  • Background: color, gradient, pattern, image or YouTube video.
  • Custom Login Page footer to display Copyright or any content.
  • Integrated Unsplash Gallery – choose from more than 1.5 millions free hi-res images.
  • Form: width, height, spacing, color, blur, border radius, complete typography, borders, shadows.
  • Form Inputs and Labels: colors, hover & focus colors, border radius, disable password icon, disable/enable “remember me” checkbox.
  • Form Submit Button: custom text, color, hover color, size, alignment, borders.
  • Form Footer: alignment, font size, change texts.
  • Messages: complete customization of login, register and lost password messages including colors.
  • Custom CSS: insert any custom CSS code for expert customization.
  • Login Page is 100% responsive.
  • Import / Export of the customizer setttings.

Under Active Development

Custom Login Page plugin is under active development and we plan to add more awesome features!
sections.installation:
Install from WordPress Plugin Dashboard

  • Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  • Search for ‘Custom Login Page’
  • Click ‘Install Now’
  • Activate the plugin on the Plugin dashboard
  • Click Customize login page to enter customizer.

Upload in WordPress Plugin Dashboard

  • Navigate to the ‘Add New’ in the plugins dashboard
  • Navigate to the ‘Upload’ area
  • Download `custom-login-page.zip` and select `custom-login-page.zip` from your directory
  • Click ‘Install Now’
  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
  • Click Customize login page to enter customizer.

FTP Upload

  • Download `custom-login-page.zip` and extract the `custom-login-page.zip` zip file to your computer
  • Upload the extracted `custom-login-page` directory to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
  • Activate the plugin in the Plugin dashboard
  • Click Customize login page to enter customizer.
sections.faq:
Why should I use Custom Login Page?

It is important to use your branding and design across whole website. You can make a complete change of login page with few clicks and 0 percent coding knowledge, so it is better ask, why should you not use it!:)
sections.changelog:
1.5.5

  • Bumped compatibility with WordPress 5.8

1.5.4

  • Updated language translation file.

1.5.3

  • Added new settings for text indentation on inputs.

1.5.2

  • Change default logo CSS.

1.5.1

  • Added custom message settings for Error: Invalid username, email address or incorrect password.

1.5.0

  • Fixed various bugs.

1.4.6

  • Resolved double error message for empty username and password if no custom message is set.

1.4.5

  • Compatibility fix with All In One WP Security & Firewall plugin.
  • Updated max-height logo settings to keep aspect ratio of the image.

1.4.4

  • New Settings: Graphic logo Max Height.
  • New Settings: Show / Hide Privacy link.
  • New Settings: User and Email custom label for register form.

1.4.3

  • Updated Cookie Expiration settings. Set 0 to non-expiration cookie instead of immediate expiration.
  • Updated customizer preview function to display / hide login page footer.
  • Login Preview URL works with 3rd party plugins changing Login URL.
  • Resolved issue if border-radius was set to 0px, the settings did not save correctly.
  • Added Live Preview for Custom CSS.
  • New Settings to change labels for Username and Password.
  • Resolved issue with overlapping skewed content on mobile devices.

1.4.2

  • Resolved error message with wrong password.

1.4.1

  • Updated customizer preview function to display / hide login page footer.

1.4

  • New Settings Page.
  • New Plugin Settings: Login Method
  • New Plugin Settings: Session Expiration
  • New Customizer Settings: Login Page footer and Copyright.

1.3

  • New Template: Modern
  • New Settings: Layout Settings
  • New Settings: Customize Login/Register Messages colors

1.2

  • New Settings: Submit button font weight select.
  • New Settings to import, export or reset the current settings.

1.1.1

  • Bumped WordPress tested version to 5.6

1.1.0

  • Integrated Unsplash Gallery
  • New customizer option to style Privacy Policy link if it’s enabled

1.0.0

  • Initial release
